GraphicsProgram Class

Extends Shareable
Defined in: src/davinci-eight/materials/GraphicsProgram.ts:49
Module: EIGHT

A GraphicsProgram instance contains one WebGLProgram for each context/canvas that it is associated with.

Constructor

GraphicsProgram

(
  • type
  • [monitors=[]]
)

Defined in src/davinci-eight/materials/GraphicsProgram.ts:49

Parameters:

  • type String

    The class name, used for logging.

  • [monitors=[]] IContextMonitor[] optional

    An array of context monitors, one for each HTML canvas you are using. The GraphicsProgram will lazily register itself (call addContextListener) with each context in order to be notified of context loss events. The GraphicsProgram will automatically unregister itself (call removeContextListener) prior to destruction.

  • Index
  • Methods
  • Properties

makeReady

(
  • async
)
protected

Defined in src/davinci-eight/materials/GraphicsProgram.ts:81

Registers this GraphicsProgram with the context monitors and synchronizes the WebGL contexts. This causes this GraphicsProgram instance to receive a contextGain call allowing WebGLProgram initialization.

Parameters:

  • async Boolean

    Reserved for future use.
